point3D    newY,
point3D    newZ
) 
 

Align two sets of axes Premultiplies the matrix by a 3D axes alignment matrix.

Parameters:
newX  A vector pointing in the direction of the new x axis.
newY  A vector pointing in the direction of the new y axis.
newZ  A vector pointing in the direction of the new z axis.

void matrix::PerspProject (  double    d ) 
 

Perspective transform Premultiplies the matrix by a 3D perspective transform.

Parameters:
d  Distance from the the VPN to the center of projection

void matrix::scale3D (  point3D    center,
point3D    direction,
double    sx,
double    sy,
double    sz
) 
 

Scale the matrix Premultiplies the matrix by a 3D scale matrix.

Parameters:
center  The point to perform the scale around
direction  The direction to align the x, y, and z axes with for the scale
sx  The scale factor in the x direction
sy  The scale factor in the y direction
sz  The scale factor in the z direction
